mapper.sql: id, user_id, school_id, campus_id, student_no, student_name, student_card_image_url, extra_image_url, status, fail_reason, review_by, review_time, submit_time, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: SELECT FROM ccp_user_school_auth WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = 2

SELECT a.id, a.school_id, s.school_name, s.short_name AS school_short_name, s.city_name, a.campus_id, c.campus_name, a.student_no, a.student_name, a.student_card_image_url, a.extra_image_url, a.status, a.fail_reason, a.submit_time, a.review_time FROM ccp_user_school_auth a LEFT JOIN ccp_school s ON a.school_id = s.id LEFT JOIN ccp_school_campus c ON a.campus_id = c.id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY a.submit_time DESC, a.id DESC

SELECT a.id, a.school_id, s.school_name, s.short_name AS school_short_name, s.city_name, a.campus_id, c.campus_name, a.student_no, a.student_name, a.student_card_image_url, a.extra_image_url, a.status, a.fail_reason, a.submit_time, a.review_time FROM ccp_user_school_auth a LEFT JOIN ccp_school s ON a.school_id = s.id LEFT JOIN ccp_school_campus c ON a.campus_id = c.id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} AND a.school_id = #{schoolId} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ccp_user_school_auth(user_id, school_id, campus_id, student_no, student_name, student_card_image_url, extra_image_url, status, fail_reason, review_by, review_time, submit_time, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{schoolId}, #{campusId}, #{studentNo}, #{studentName}, #{studentCardImageUrl}, #{extraImageUrl}, #{status}, #{failReason}, #{reviewBy}, #{reviewTime}, #{submitTime}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
